name: Zentail
headline: We're making ecommerce simple connecting brands with sales channels
description: Zentail makes adding online sales channels  for ecommerce brands as simple as adding a friend on Facebook.  Our mission is to make ecommerce simple and we do it with our ecommerce network that automates away all of the work getting a listing formatted for different marketplaces with different requirements.
generated_description:
Zentail is the company that streamlines the e-commerce landscape for brands looking to sell across multiple channels. Founded in 2011 and part of Y Combinator's S12 Batch, the company is based in Columbia, MD, and operates with a team of about 30 people. Its mission is straightforward: to make e-commerce easy by connecting brands with sales channels efficiently—like adding a friend on Facebook, but for online sales.

At its core, Zentail helps e-commerce brands automate the tedious work of listing products on various marketplaces, each with their unique requirements. Their platform provides a central catalog, simplifying processes like order management, product data organization, inventory forecasting, and analytics. Think of it as a comprehensive toolkit that reduces the time and effort traditionally needed to manage listings across platforms like Amazon, Walmart, and Target.

Zentail’s technology, especially its SMART Types feature, allows users to automate the listing process either by single SKU or in bulk, adjusting for marketplace requirements on the fly. This adaptability means brands can save time, maintain high listing publish rates (over 99%), and drastically reduce manual data entry—by about 90%, in fact.

Customers rave about the flexibility, ease of onboarding, and exceptional customer support. They can identify sales gaps across channels quickly, make data-driven decisions, and keep their operations running smoothly—all vital capabilities in today’s fast-paced e-commerce world.

If you're an e-commerce brand looking to optimize your multichannel strategy and simplify operations, visit [Zentail](https://zentail.com) to book a demo and learn more about how they can support your growth ambitions. They not only provide the tools to manage your e-commerce sales but also insightful analytics to help navigate the complexities of online retail effectively.
